reviews.text:
I know understand why Hot Chicken Takeover is always empty. 

Dave's has great chicken, sides and sauces.  Get a slider and an extra tender.  You will not...
You can choose from chicken sliders or tenders so I got the two piece tenders with fries and sliced bread. I liked how you could get two different flavors...

Great experience 
Knowledgeable host and very helpful 
The food is amazing as hot chicken as you expect 
Good for family or friends
